heisig_chinese_memo: This looks like a pictograph of 3 fingers from each hand trying to open up a crack in a wall. That's an non-believable, I mean un-believable way to escape from prison OR the UN- have a prison in the Hague.
heisig_story: This key word, a negating prefix, is a doodle of a heavy iron pole with bars extending in both directions, to create the picture of a jail cell. From there to "un-" is but a short step.
koohiiStory1: This looks like a pictogram of 3 fingers from each hand trying to open up a crack in a wall. ThatÂ´s an un-believable way to escape from prison OR the UN- have a prison in the Hague.
koohiiStory2: People in the jail cell are un-friendly, un-comely, and un-cooperative.

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A criminal has done an injustice on the world or other people. Being a criminal is a negative thing, and even if it was just a mistake, it was still a crime.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Think of all the criminals you know. Even if what they did was a mistake, it was still some type of injustice, right? It was something the rest of the world sees as a negative thing.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When you commit an injustice, you'll know because heat (ã²) fills your body. Maybe you've never done any kind of big thing, but when you make a mistake your face fills with heat and you turn red!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: This is the heat of embarrassment, of knowing you did something negative or wrong.

humanum_full_description_en:
The shape of wings spreading to the left and right of a golden inscription. The original meaning is wings (Xu Shen, Lin Yiguang). After the left and right wings are spread, they will face each other, so " non " is contrary to the meaning. "Shuowen": "No, no. Cong Fei Xia Yan, whichever is the opposite. Anything that is non-belongs to the wrong."

Oracle is used as a negative word to mean nothing, "Compilation" 16927: "Not ğ¡†¥(æ„›)", which means there is no worry. Also used as a place name.

Jin Wen means negligence and error, and Mao Gongding: "To quote only wisdom (knowing) but not to blame, but to (have) to hear." " Wen " means to hear and know, which means that you know my mistakes, and you must tell me often. It is also used as a verb to indicate that it is wrong. Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "No one is wrong."

Spring and Autumn jade script, Hou Ma League book: "Ma Yi is not (Bi) is (Clan)", which is equivalent to "Mi Shi Bi Shi" ("Gong Yang Chuan. The 27th Year of Xiang Gong"), which means the barbarian destroys the other Clan (Zhu Dexi, Qiu Xigui).

Bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are used as negative words, "Tsinghua Jane One. "Imperial Gate": "I don't dare to use clear punishments for people who are too impressed", which means that I dare not use strict punishments for boys. "Guodian Jane. "Qing Da Yishi" Jane 9: "Zixu (Xu) worked many times before, and died afterwards. It is not (its) wisdom is also declining." It means that Wu Zixu has done a lot in the past and was killed later, not because of his wisdom. attenuation.
humanum_short_description_en: The wings of a golden inscription on both sides. The original meaning is wings. Since the left and right wings are facing away from each other, " non " is contrary to the meaning.

    The shape of wings spreading to the left and right of a golden inscription. The original meaning is wings (Xu Shen, Lin Yiguang). After the left and right wings are spread, they will face each other, so " non" is contrary to the meaning. "Shuowen": "No, no. Cong Fei Xia Yan, whichever is the opposite. Anything that is non-belongs to the wrong." Oracle is used as a negative word to mean nothing, "Compilation" 16927: "Not ğ¡†¥(æ„›)", which means there is no worry. Also used as a place name. Jin Wen means negligence and error, and Mao Gongding: "To quote only wisdom (knowing) but not to blame, but to (have) to hear." " Wen" means to hear and know, which means that you know my mistakes, and you must tell me often. It is also used as a verb to indicate that it is wrong. Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "No one is wrong." Spring and Autumn jade script, Hou Ma League book: "Ma Yi is not (Bi) is (Clan)", which is equivalent to "Mi Shi Bi Shi" ("Gong Yang Chuan. The 27th Year of Xiang Gong"), which means the barbarian destroys the other Clan (Zhu Dexi, Qiu Xigui). Bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are used as negative words, "Tsinghua Jane One. "Imperial Gate": "I don't dare to use clear punishments for people who are too impressed", which means that I dare not use strict punishments for boys. "Guodian Jane. "Qing Da Yishi" Jane 9: "Zixu (Xu) worked many times before, and died afterwards. It is not (its) wisdom is also declining." It means that Wu Zixu has done a lot in the past and was killed later, not because of his wisdom. attenuation.

    Radicals: é  (criminal)
    Meaning Mnemonic
    A criminal has done an injustice on the world or other people. Being a criminal is a negative thing, and even if it was just a mistake, it was still a crime.
    Think of all the criminals you know. Even if what they did was a mistake, it was still some type of injustice, right? It was something the rest of the world sees as a negative thing.
    Reading Mnemonic
    When you commit an injustice, you'll know because heat (ã²) fills your body. Maybe you've never done any kind of big thing, but when you make a mistake your face fills with heat and you turn red!
    This is the heat of embarrassment, of knowing you did something negative or wrong.
